) I

The O

IMPORTANCE O

IMPORTANCE O
Worldwide O
, O
more O

170 O
million O

are O

with O

( I

) I
, O

of O

potential O

with O

( I

- I
Congo I
hemorrhagic I
fever I
virus I
( I

) I
is O
a O

- O

Nairovirus O
of O
the O

family O
, O

Here O
, O
we O

The O

( I

) I
has O

to O
successfully O

the O

( I

. O

The O
prototypic O

, O

( I

Rift B
Valley I
fever I

( I

) I

IMPORTANCE O

( I

) I
